QuestData.Title: Critter Scatter Shot
QuestData.Description:
The howlers in these hills travel in packs. Three against one isn't a fight I want to pick.
Luckily those wolves are no match for my engineering skills! I just put the finishing touches on the prototype of a device that will help scatter the pack. All I need now is some ammo...
Snatch me some rabbits from the meadow south of here, and I'll let you be the first to try out the hand cannon.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you snatched the rabbits yet?
QuestData.RewardText: Hrm, these rabbits are a bit bigger than I thought, but we should still be able to stuff a few of them into the hand cannon.
